description: [DEPRECATED] This preset forwards to Renovate's official 'customManagers:makefileVersions' preset
It is a compatibility alias kept to preserve backwards compatibility
prBodyNotes:
---
> [!WARNING]
> #### Deprecated preset: `Kong/public-shared-renovate:makefile`
>
> This preset has been replaced by Renovate's official preset [`customManagers:makefileVersions`](https://docs.renovatebot.com/presets-customManagers/#custommanagersmakefileversions). Although not identical, the official preset is a superset and a safe drop-in replacement.
>
> #### Action required
>
> Update your Renovate config to extend directly from `customManagers:makefileVersions`.
>
> #### Timeline
>
> This compatibility alias is temporary and is scheduled for removal in January 2026.
>
> #### Reference
>
> See the Renovate documentation for details: https://docs.renovatebot.com/presets-customManagers/#custommanagersmakefileversions
